attributes.action: encourage RBS account holders to move their accounts to a mutual financial institution if senior managers get paid bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to show the strength of feeling of the public about RBS managers receiving bonuses the Prime Minister should encourage RBS account holders to move their accounts to other mutual financial institutions. The threat of putting the RBS managers out of work may concentrate their minds further.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
